name: ICC 857 Spray/Wipe™
description: ICC 857 Spray/Wipe™ is a highly effective press wash that works well with multiple ink types. It is great for vinyl inks. it can be used to replace petroleum solvents as a screen opener, for cleaning between color changes and for removing inks from printing screens in Gross Clean™ procedure. It can also be used to remove inks from screens in a recirculating screen washer and can be used on any type of mesh.
